extensions.description: HUMAScoin (HUMSX) is the official token of the HUMAS System — the internal currency of a human-centered digital economy, backed by human energy. 1 HUNIT = 1 kWh. HUMAScoin = 0.382 kWh. It transforms human effort, thought, and emotion into measurable, transferable digital assets. More than a token, it’s a tool of transformation in a meritocratic model where contribution becomes value, and energy becomes legacy.
